data.name: HomeSubtitle
data.value: I'm a tech enthusiast, coffee drinker, and software developer.

data.name: Intro1
data.value: My primary focus is C#, though I have dabbled in several other languages such as Java, Kotlin, VB, C/C++, Python, and others. Over the years I've built up a collection of projects. Some of which I'm extremely proud of, and others I've quietly abandoned and buried. I'm currently working on a few projects that I hope to release in the near future, but in the meantime, feel free to check out some of my previous work.
